ISSUE.TITLE: Enhance tower_job_wait to support project_update/inventory_update/workflow_job in addtion to job
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: ##### ISSUE TYPE - Feature Idea ##### SUMMARY tower_job_wait only supports waiting on tasks of the type 'job' I would like to see this module (or potenitally a seperate one, the code I wrote is to suppor this in one module) support waiting for other similar jobs Addtional "job" types allowed - 'project_update' - 'job' # default - 'inventory_update' - 'workflow_job' I have started development work on this feature. A pull will be incoming.

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: Optional tower cli (#3) * Allow running tests without tower_cli * patch up test mutability * Fix test import error, warning mock * flake8 error Update documentation for non-converted modules

COMMIT.MESSAGE: related #8344 add support for wait of project_updates jobs, inventory_update, and workflow_job.
